alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:09PM EDT until September 07 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Broome County in central New York... West central Delaware County in central New York... Southern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 508 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sanitaria Springs, or 12 miles northeast of Binghamton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has a history of producing wind damage in the Binghamton area. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Guilford, Sanford, Coventry, Greene, Oxford, Bainbridge, Windsor, Afton, and South Oxford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
